title: Delphi Complete Works of Victor Hugo (Illustrated).epub
description:
Features:
* concise introductions to the novels and other works
* images of how the novels first appeared, giving your Kindle a taste of the original texts
* ALL 9 novels in English, each with contents tables
* some of the novels, including LES MISÃƒâ€°RABLES, are fully-illustrated with their original artwork
* includes BUG-JARGAL - Hugo's first novel, which he wrote after a wager - first time in digital print!
* all novels are presented with their French versions - sample the true brilliance of Hugo's original text, in between reading the English translations
* features a large sample of English translations of poetry
* the COMPLETE poetry in French
* includes four plays in French
* BONUS selection of six Non-Fiction texts 
* boasts a special literary criticism section, with works by famous writers such as Dickens, Robert Louis Stevenson and Henry James, examining Hugo's contribution to literature
* includes Hugo's Memoirs - explore the great writer's private notebooks!
* ALSO includes G. Barnett Smith's famous biography Ã¢â‚¬â€œ immerse yourself in Hugo's literary life!
* packed full of images relating to HugoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s life, works, places and film adaptations
* scholarly ordering of texts in chronological order and literary genres, allowing easy navigation around HugoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s immense oeuvre
* UPDATED with two plays in English, including CROMWELL, HugoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s first drama, with its legendary PREFACE Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the first Romantic manifesto


Victor Hugo, the greatest Romantic writer of them all, is finally available in DelphiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s bestselling range of titles. This monumental eBook offers readers the most complete collection ever compiled of HugoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s FICTIONAL works in English translation, with many bonus texts.

Please note: a complete works of Victor Hugo in English is not possible due to copyright restrictions, scarce translations and some works having never been translated. However, we do ensure our readers that every possible major text is included, with many novels and other texts appearing here for the first time on the Kindle. To compensate for the missing poetry and plays, original French texts have been provided in their place. As soon as new translations become available, they will be added as free updates for customers who have already purchased this eBook.
